bs-distributionconnector-extension-descr: Connects BlueSpice to various MediaWiki extensions
bs-distributionconnector-tag-categorytre: Displays a dynamic tree structure on the category system in the wiki. Between the tags the root category has to be indicated.
bs-distributionconnector-tag-ref-desc: Marks the text between the tags as footnote.
bs-distributionconnector-tag-references-: Displays the list of footnotes which were inserted into the articles.
bs-distributionconnector-tag-quiz-desc: Adds simple quiz questions to an article.
bs-distributionconnector-tag-embedvideo-: Embeds video clips from popular sharing platforms.
bs-distributionconnector-tag-dynamicpage: Generates a dynamic list of articles based on various parameters.
